revised_title: Case Study: Unusual Limb Mortification in a Family
tldr: This article describes a rare case of mortification of limbs in a family, where several members experienced severe pain, swelling, and eventual decay of their feet, legs, and hands. The author, James Bones, provides a detailed account of the symptoms and progression of the disease in each family member. The case raises questions about the possible causes and treatments for this unusual condition.
